snippet: Eight soldiers were killed and 30 hostages taken in an attack apparently prompted by a visit to a northern city by the newly appointed prime minister.
abstract: Separatist Tuareg rebels launch assault on city of Kidal in northern Mali, killing eight soldiers, storming government buildings and taking 30 hostages; attack is apparently prompted by newly appointed Prime Min Moussa Mara's visit.
lead_paragraph: Eight soldiers were killed and 30 hostages taken in an attack apparently prompted by a visit to a northern city by the newly appointed prime minister.

headline.main: Mali Rebels Attack and Seize Hostages
headline.print_headline: Mali Rebels Attack and Seize Hostages
